name: Ext_R2_Conformance_re_re_in_code
title: Cross-version Extension for R2.Conformance.rest.resource.interaction.code for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents Conformance.rest.resource.interaction.code from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Conformance|1.0.2 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: read | vread | update | delete | history-instance | validate | history-type | create | search-type
element.definition: Coded identifier of the operation, supported by the system resource.
element.comment: `CapabilityStatement.rest.resource.interaction.code` maps to R4B `CapabilityStatement.rest.resource.interaction.code`. So is mapped as Equivalent.

element.short: read | vread | update | delete | history-instance | validate | history-type | create | search-type
element.definition: Coded identifier of the operation, supported by the system resource.
element.comment: `CapabilityStatement.rest.resource.interaction.code` maps to R4B `CapabilityStatement.rest.resource.interaction.code`. So is mapped as Equivalent.

binding.description: Operations supported by REST at the type or instance level.
